body_html: Was this issue solved? - I too am having the same error with TF 1.3.0, cuDNN 6.0, CUDA 8.0 and keras. Altering the GPU-options didn't work. Many answers suggest checking for Zombie processes running in the background taking up GPU memory (I have none)
